heading: HR01921
0: A RESOLUTION SUPPORTING THE CITY OF ZAMBOANGA'S OBJECTION AGAINST THE RELEASE OF THE NINETY-SIX (96) MORO NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (MNLF) FIGHTERS INVOLVED IN THE 2013 ZAMBOAGA SIEGE AS A RESULT OF THE PLEA BARGAINING AGREEMENT ENTERED INTO BY THE DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE AND ACCUSED MNLF FIGHTERS

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01921
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION SUPPORTING THE CITY OF ZAMBOANGA'S OBJECTION AGAINST THE RELEASE OF THE NINETY-SIX (96) MORO NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (MNLF) FIGHTERS INVOLVED IN THE 2013 ZAMBOAGA SIEGE AS A RESULT OF THE PLEA BARGAINING AGREEMENT ENTERED INTO BY THE DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE AND ACCUSED MNLF FIGHTERS
